page.title: 16Andoversford -Public House
page.content: Mr.Farley has owned the Royal Oak for 20 years.He has the pub records going back to 1643. The pub used to be a training centre for young soldiers.A famous General Patton used to drink in the pub.One year Mr.Farley found a wheelbarrow full of cartridge shells in his garden. He enjoys running the pub and does not mind working when everyone else is working as he gets more money. He gets up at 7o'clock every morning and works 80 hours a week.He does not get much spare time. Most of his regulars buy him a drink and he never has any trouble from people where the Police are concerned.
